com.gensym.util
Interface WorkspaceListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
WorkspaceAdapter, EventMulticaster
public interface WorkspaceListener
extends EventListener

The listener interface for handling workspace events.

Method Summary
 void receivedInitialDownload(WorkspaceEvent event)
          Invoked when the listener is added (within the context of the addWorkspaceListener method).
 void workspaceItemAdded(WorkspaceEvent event)
          Invoked when an item is transferred onto the Workspace
 void workspaceItemAttributesChanged(WorkspaceEvent event)
          Invoked when one of the interesting virtual attributes of an item changes.
 void workspaceItemColorsChanged(WorkspaceEvent event)
          Invoked when an item on the workspace changes colors
 void workspaceItemIconVariablesChanged(WorkspaceEvent event)
          Invoked when the icon-variables of an item on the workspace changes
 void workspaceItemMoved(WorkspaceEvent event)
          Invoked when an item on the workspace is moved
 void workspaceItemRemoved(WorkspaceEvent event)
          Invoked when an item is transferred off the Workspace
 void workspaceItemResized(WorkspaceEvent event)
          Invoked when an item on the workspace is resized
 void workspaceItemRotated(WorkspaceEvent event)
          Invoked when an item on the workspace is rotated
 void workspaceResized(WorkspaceEvent event)
          Invoked when the Workspace bounds changes
